metadata.name: extends_swf_7
metadata.description: Tests EXTENDS opcode (0x69) for prototype-based inheritance. Verifies that EXTENDS sets up __proto__ property correctly, though constructor property has a known bug and prototype chain traversal is not yet implemented.
missing_features: Constructor property not set correctly - Dog.prototype.constructor should equal Animal but comparison fails
Prototype chain traversal not implemented - GET_MEMBER only searches own properties, not __proto__ chain
instanceof opcode doesn't use prototype chain - always returns false (requires prototype chain support)
NEW_OBJECT not fully functional with inheritance
Method inheritance not working - child instances cannot call parent methods via prototype chain

known_bugs.details: After EXTENDS, Dog.prototype.constructor should point to Animal, but STRICT_EQUALS comparison returns false. The __proto__ property IS set correctly, so the issue is specific to how the constructor property is stored or compared.
